title: Calories in Saltine Crackers
meta_description: Learn calories in saltine crackers per standard serving of 5, plus carbs, sodium, fat details, and simple tweaks for your snack.
assumptions: Standard plain saltine crackers (~3g each), no added toppings or flavors.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, recipe, and preparation; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A serving of 5 saltine crackers has about 70 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Top with 1 tsp cream cheese per 5 crackers

faqs.q: How many calories in one saltine cracker?
faqs.a: About 14 kcal per standard saltine cracker.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in saltine crackers?
faqs.a: 5 crackers have 10 g total carbs, with 0.5 g fiber and 0 g sugars.

faqs.q: Are saltine crackers high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, 5 crackers contain 230 mg sodiumâ€”about 10% of daily value.

faqs.q: Calories in saltine crackers vs. whole wheat?
faqs.a: Whole wheat versions are similar at ~70 kcal for 5 but may add fiber.

faqs.q: Do saltine crackers have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Minimal: 1 g protein and 3 g fat for 5 crackers.
